Conversation.line: Alright folks, let's take her out for a spin!
Aye aye.
Aye, sir!
Yes capitan!
They that go down to the sea in ships;
That do business in great waters;
These see the works of the Lord, and His wonders in the deep.
Off we go! Good luck, crew!
Ain't no works of the Lord down here.
Buckle down, we've got a long road ahead of us!
Aye, sir!
Aye aye!
Welcome on board! Please keep your hands and arms inside the vehicle at all times.
Aye, sir!
Aye aye!
Ready crew, we got long way to go!
Aye, sir!
Aye aye!
Honkmother have mercy on our souls.
Is captain speaking! Ready for mission crew and good luck!
Aye, sir!
Aye aye.
Aye, sir!
Let's see what the Ocean has in store for us this time!
Everyone ready? You better be, ain't no turning back anymore.
Aye, sir!.
Let's do this!
Ready always!
I'm cold.
I have a bad feeling about this...
I knew this old captain who used to say...
You can't calm the storm, so stop trying.
What you can do is calm yourself, the storm will pass.
I'm sure we all do.
I can hear the hull creaking.
I hear too.
Can't wait to get back home and pop a bottle of Ol' Cadmus.
Focus on your job or you'll get to join that bottle in your casket.
Haha! Burial in a casket! When was the last time that happened?
This ain't no time to think about home, we've got a long way ahead of us.
Cadmus fish piss. I like it stronger.
Back in the Earth Navy they had this saying...
There are two ways to do things; the right way, and again.
That don't apply here. No second chances on Europa.
So everyone, focus on the task at hand.
I'm Popeye the sailor man!
I'm strong to the finich, cause I eats me spinach!
Doc, have you been at the ethanol stash again?
Okay, I'll stop.
Sorry for trying to lighten the mood.
No singing on my boat.
I miss the sun.
I've heard sunlight gives you cancer. We're better off without it.
Jupiter gives you cancer too. I'd take the sun over Jupiter any day.
Cut it out.
Cut it out.
Husks creep me out.
Me too. Promise to put a spear through my head if I ever get infected.
I'd rather give you a shot of calyxanide.
I would've gone with calyxanide, but a spear will do too.
Has any of you heard of labor unions?
That's communist talk. The Coalition is the only union we need.
Yes, what about it?
I think we should establish one.
We could use some better safety standards, proper wages, retirement benefits...
You think you're going to live long enough to retire?
Well I sure hope so.
Fair point.
Safety standards? Is the union going to keep the Molochs away or hold your hand when you're trying to fight a leak?
That's not what I meant.
I guess you've got a point.
Ever seen what happens to a human body when it's exposed to the pressure outside?
I can imagine.
Still can't get the image out of my head.
A bag of meat and bones under a hydraulic press, that's the only way I can describe it.
The loving embrace of Europa.
Take her fast, take her deep...
Take her where the fishes sleep!
Damn the depth, damn the pressure...
Take her down just like the Thresher!
No singing on my boat.
Okay okay, I won't try to lighten the mood again!
I know that's an Earth song but it's all too fitting for us!
Are we there yet?
Shut up.
Still not funny.
Is no funny.
Any of you remember the Earth?
I'm old, but not that old.
My grandpa was an Earther.
I loved listening to his stories, although I'm sure half of those were made up.
Can you imagine just walking out of your house, seeing the sky all around you?
That sounds amazing.
Looking up without having to worry about a gas giant frying you with radiation...
I would've loved to see birds.
And dogs. And elephants.
And rhinosaurus!
Do you ever wonder what happened to whoever built the ruins?
Who doesn't?
I'll leave the wondering to the researchers.
Got more important things to worry about down here.
Only the Abyss knows.
I think about it but think no-one know.
Ever seen one of those things that guard the ruins?
Yes, but I wish I could forget about it.
They have one at the institute.
They say it's not organic - closer to a robot than an animal.
They don't bleed, that's for sure.
Cigarettes are so expensive nowadays.
Tell me about it.
Well yeah, hydroponic farms are expensive.
Makes more sense to use those for something more useful than tobacco.
What is hydroponic?
Water-grown. Like everything here.
Did you hear that?
Hear what?
Like something clawing at the hull.
Probably just my imagination.
Some deep groaning sound from the outside.
The Crabmen. I've told you.
Probably just the hull. Relax.
I read an old sailor's manual the other day.
Couldn't wrap my head around some parts because of all the weird, ancient terminology.
For instance, what the hell is a starboard?
Your guess is as good as mine.
Upwards perhaps? You know, towards the stars?
Do you ever get the feeling the whole moon is against us?
Well, it's not the most hospitable place to settle in.
Given the circumstances, I think it actually is.
You know what I meant.
You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
We don't belong here, that's for sure.
Things just keep going wrong no matter what we do.
Enough. That's starting to sound like the cultist bullshit.
Enough. That's starting to sound like the cultist bullshit.
Enough with that.
Second to Sun, second to Sun...
Like Jupiter, we are the ones...
If you really must sing, please keep the headset off.
This sucks!
I love it!
I want some action!
Smooth seas don't make skillful sailors.
Rough sea make dead sailors!
We should get a coffeemaker on board.
I don't drink coffee.
I saw a crawler the other day. Horrible creatures.
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day;
Teach a man to fish and he most likely dies in a horrible accident.
I don't think that's how it goes.
Here that's exactly how it goes.
Enough with the joking.
You know, I had a brilliant business idea the other day.
Hear me out. We could make lots of money with this.
What if someone started making bigger oxygen tanks?
Ones that last like an hour or two?
I'm not an expert but I think it'd be technically possible.
Hey, how about we focus on the task at hand?
I don't know, there has to be some technical reason. Otherwise they'd be making those already.
Is good idea!
Hey, how about we focus on the task at hand?
Water-proof junction boxes.
Genius, am I right?
Hey, how about we focus on the task at hand?
There must be a reason why they always have those ventilation holes.
Otherwise they'd already be making water-proof ones.
Is great idea!
Hey, how about we focus on the task at hand?
Awfully quiet in here.
Is my headset still working?
It is. Please keep the chatter to a minimum.
Hear you loud and clear.
Yes hear you good!
Radio check.
Loud and clear.
Good and readable.
All good!
Yes hear you good!
Can you hear the Crabmen singing?
For the last time, the Crabmen don't exist.
Diving deeper? No. Diving inward.
You're a fucking lost cause.
I don't understood.
Can God see through leagues of ice?
Or is it Jupiter?
That makes no sense.
Or perhaps it's the Abyss, this gaze upon us.
The cult is right about one thing, there is something down there.
Perhaps, perhaps.
But we've got more important things to worry about right now.
At times I feel like we're just puppets on a string.
Dancing and dying for the amusement of the thing beyond the curtain.
No dancing or dying on my boat, please.
I don't find any of this amusing at all.
This is going to be a rough ride.
This is getting tense.
We can do this.
Finally some action!
Her work has begun!
Just a setback!
How quickly the tide turns.
This bad!
No good!
Join the fleet they said! It'll be an exciting experience they said!
I'm gonna need a drink after this!
Alright crew, show me what you've got!
We're not out of the woods yet!
I don't want to die!
Should've become a botanist instead!
Hang in there everyone! We can do it!
Are you sure?
I'm done with this shit!
If I don't make it, tell my momma I love her!
Shut the fuck up!
Cut it out, you're going to make it!
If we make it out of this I'm resigning!
And so life ebbs, and her thirst is quenched...
We sure fucked up this time.
Oh god.
Oh boy.
It was an honor serving with you guys.
I always feel uneasy when we dive his deep.
It'll be fine. She's been deeper.
Is scary when we go this deep.
That's what she said.
It'll be fine. She's been deeper.
Can you hear the hull groaning? Are you sure this is safe?
Shouldn't have joined the Fleet if safety is what you're after.
We'll make it. She's been deeper.
It should be fine. Keep the welders ready though.
I'm feeling faint.
I'm not feeling too good.
I think I need some blood plasma.
I don't say this too often, but you guysss are the best.
Couldn't ask for a better crew!
Are you drunk?
Calm down man iss all good!
Not really, I just had a few sips.
What, I just wanned to tell how much I appreciate all of ya!
You lissen to me... Werr gonna make it out of this!
I think I sshould lay down for a bit...
Oh for fuck's sake. Stay out of the way until you sober up.
Whatsshall we do with the drunkenn sailor, what shall we do wit' the drunken sailor...
Earley in the mornin'!
You're in no condition to do your duties, sailor. When you sober up, we're going to have a serious talk.
Nah I can handle thhis!
Someone's in a good mood!
Oh for fuck's sake. Stay out of the way until you sober up.
Why's the boat rockin' thhis bad?
I'm pretty sure it's just you.
Get your act together!
I don't feel too good.
I feel nauseous...
My leg is killing me, could I get some morphine?
There's nothing wrong with your leg. I think you should cut back on the morphine for a while.
There's nothing wrong with your leg, you junkie.
I can't do this.
I think I'm going to throw up.
I shouldn't be here. I wan't to go home.
I feel like I'm dying, I can't do this!
I think you could use a shot of Naloxone.
Cut it out.
Where's the fuck is the morphine?
You don't need any more of that. We need to get you some naloxone.
Somewhere you can't reach, I hope.
What's going on? Are you hurt?
I feel like I'm fucking dying, I can't do this if I don't get some.
My muscles are cramping and my heart is about to blow up, I can't take this!
I've been shot, get me some bandages!
Help, I've been shot!
